Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/21st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Pulaski and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
